text:
Q: Can pets 🐶🐱 at home spread the new #coronavirus?
A: At present, there is no evidence that companion animals/pets such as dogs, cats can be infected with the virus. However, it is always a good idea to wash your hands with soap and water after contact with pets. https://t.co/A1e6af3G1B
